document_data.name: Jeralla
document_data.refs5e: {{Cite adventurers league/Outlaws of the Iron Route|27}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Jeralla''' was a [[dragonborn]] sorcerer of [[red dragon]] ancestry who was a bandit leader in the [[Moonsea]] in [[1489 DR]].
document_data.Personality: Jeralla believed herself to be a Chosen of Tiamat but this was a false claim. She intended to gather treasures to fund the [[Hoard of the Dragon Queen]].
document_data.History:
In [[Thar]], Jeralla gathered an army of [[kobold]] followers of [[Tiamat]] and formed the [[Claws of Tiamat]] bandit group. Jeralla led the Claws into the Moonsea to raid caravans.{{Cite adventurers league/Outlaws of the Iron Route|5}}

She drew the attention of many others. The [[Cult of the Dragon]] sent a spy, [[Sharrak]], to infiltrate the group, which they considered heretical. The [[Gray Patriots]] bandit group offered an alliance. Some merchants hired an adventuring party to clear the [[Iron Route]] of all the outlaws. Jeralla agreed to meet the Gray Patriots, but the meeting place was attacked both by the adventurers and a cultist war band.{{Cite adventurers league/Outlaws of the Iron Route|14-15}} In the fighting, Jeralla was killed.{{Cite adventurers league/Outlaws of the Iron Route|21}}
